description: Zucchini boats stuffed with blue cheese and buttery leeks are so simple to make and are delicious as a vegetarian entree or lunch.
keywords: Stuffed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Blue Cheese & Leek Stuffed Zucchini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. Heat half of the oil in a large pan and cook the zucchinis in batches, cut side down, for 2-3 minutes. Scoop out the centre of each zucchini out with a teaspoon and reserve. Place the zucchini boats in an ovenproof dish.
Heat the rest of the oil in the pan with the butter and cook the leeks and zucchini centres for 5 minutes. Spoon the mix into the zucchini boats.
Sprinkle over crumbled blue cheese and pecans and roast for 20 minutes.
